Content: Don't look at me COMMON_PLAYERNAME.|You will pay for what you did at lunch.
(Your neighbors seems busy but Natalie looks at you.)|COMMON_PLAYERNAME!  I hope you had fun at the club.
(Your neighbors seems busy.  Natalie sits next to|you but stares at the clock and ignores you.)
(She lowers her eyes and speaks politely.)|Greetings.  I hope your first day went well.
Get lost.  I will kill you after|school for what you did outside.
Get lost.  I don't want to talk with you.
Dork, this row is for cool girls only.|You're not allowed to sit here.
Welcome to the cool girls row.|It's great to have you here.
(Your neighbors seems busy except for|Sidney that's starring blankly at the room.)
